scripts.test: yarn test:json && yarn test:data && yarn test:pipe && echo 'It is just work...'
scripts.test:json:
node render.js --json '{}' && read -rsp $'Press any key to continue...
' -n1 key && clear
scripts.test:data:
node render.js 'Hello, world' && read -rsp $'Press any key to continue...

' -n1 key && clear
